content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you like the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it's in a great location. So, how much are you thinking about paying for this fantastic apartment? Remember, I'm looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, considering the location and the fact that it's a new apartment, I think 800 Euro per month would be a fair price. I'm sure you're looking for a reasonable offer that reflects the value of the property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 800 Euro per month is not bad at all. But I'm sure you understand that for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities, 800 Euro is a bit low. I'm sure you can offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I understand your point. How about 850 Euro per month? This seems like a good compromise, considering the amenities and the quality of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 850 Euro per month is better, but I'm sure you understand that for such a prime location and the quality of the apartment, we can aim higher. I'm sure you can offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see your point. Considering the market value and the location, I'm willing to go up to 875 Euro per month. This should reflect the investment you've made in this property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 875 Euro per month is getting closer to what I'm looking for. But I'm sure you understand that for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities, we can aim higher. I'm sure you can offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Given the quality of the apartment and its location, I'm prepared to increase my offer to 900 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 925 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't go that high. My maximum offer is 900 Euro per month. If you're not willing to accept that, I'm afraid I'll have to look for other options.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is lower than my expectation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. If you're not willing to accept 900 Euro per month, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement. I'll look for other options that better fit my budget. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
